text: Sögtrop is a locality in the municipality Schmallenberg in the district Hochsauerlandkreis in North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. The village has 106 inhabitantSchmallenberg.de: Inhabitants and lies in the north of the municipality of Schmallenberg at a height of around 383 m on the Kreisstraße 38. The river Rarbach flows through the village. Sögtrop borders on the villages of Kirchrarbach, Landenbeck, Mönekind and Herhagen. Sögtrop was first mentioned in 1225 in a document.Albert K. Hömberg: Geschichtliche Nachrichten über Adelssitze und Rittergüter im Herzogtum Westfalen und ihre Besitzer – Register, von Söchtrop, S. 148, Münster, 2013 (Materialien der Historischen Kommission für Westfalen, PDF-Datei in German) The village used to belong to the municipality of Rarbach in Amt Fredeburg until the end of 1974. == Gallery == File:Soegtrop.jpg|Sögtrop File:St. Blasius Kapelle in Sögtrop - panoramio.jpg|Chapel St. Blasius ==References== == External links == * Sögtrop Category:Villages in North Rhine-Westphalia Category:Schmallenberg
